summary: Harya tries all possible ways to free his land from villagers who use it everyday to answer nature's call.
cast: Vinay Apte|Suhas Bhalekar|Bharat Jadhav|Mohan Joshi|Padarinath Kamble|Sneha Kulkarni|Jayraj Nair|Kishore Nandlaskar|Monika Pandit|Nisha Parulekar|Sandeep Pathak|Sachin Pilgaonkar|Mahesh Raut|Jayant Sawarkar|Aarti Solanki|Vishakha Subhedar|Satish Tare|Shweta Tiwari
title: Yedyanchi Jatra
